title: Rockson1
author: Rockson1
content: In our everyday life price of commodities continues to increase in Nigeria in the market items that where both for 25%increase to 75% in our everyday life things begins to get out of hand,naira scarcity no money to buy things in the market  cust of living is on a very high side what can we do to manage the situation in the nation.

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Quote from: Rockson1 on February 11, 2023, 06:53:54 PMIn our everyday life price of commodities continues to increase in Nigeria in the market items that where both for 25%increase to 75% in our everyday life things begins to get out of hand,naira scarcity no money to buy things in the market  cust of living is on a very high side what can we do to manage the situation in the nation.Yeah we are well aware of the mata wey full this country. As e be now this country na watin u see nai u go manage because e don tire everybody and the worse mata be the government tend to be always worsening the whole situation. The price of foodstuffs in the nation keep shooting high wish is very bad because this tend to make cost of living very high for the average man.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: To me I don't even know what Nigerians can do now to stop the increase of commodities and scarcity of money, because if we try to do anything concerning it ( maybe a protest) it will bounce back to us, for example you see the problems going on in other states like bemin etc, I saw it online when they are shooting at protester, people are dying for their own right,To me I think we should just pray to have money so we can purchase all the commodities we need, because anything wey increase in price for Nigeria no dey decrease again, may God help us...

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: The only way out ,is for Nigerians to vote in a good president that can change the corrupt political system. Someone who will welcome new innovations, fix up our refineries, so that we can start refining our crude in the country. Also working on abandoned natural resources that can help boost the country economy than focusing on crude oil alone. Nigeria problems are so big that corruption has caused, due to the greed of every individual in Nigeria including myself.

comments.author: Remiscoin5
comments.body: Yes is true my brother I agree with you. Nigeria can only get a good President by we voting the right person. But the problem now is that corruption everywhere. Our politicians will be using their money to influence on the youths by buying our mind. And when they win they will do whatever they want because they will say they paid for it. I urge my fellow Nigerians. my fellow youths. To vote wisely this time around nobody should receive them with their so-called wealth

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: You know this worst part, I hear say with all this no collecting of old money so, another business don turn up o. The news now carry say, Aboki way dey buy and sell dollar for street, them don dey buy old naira notes now. Nothing way no go turn hustle for this we country.Now on top of this matter, say people don dey reject old notes and Aboki dey buy old notes, e go make you wonder where them dey spend am or carry am go?Person way no get small connect for this we country don dey truly finished I tell you. I just wish say, we go get free and fair election come next week Saturday and hope the people go come out and exercise there Civil right and obligation to the nation. We don see many things way suppose don reach to say enough is enough.
